text: Walter Payton (July 25, 1954 â€“ November 1, 1999) was an American football player. He was born in Columbia, Mississippi. Payton played for the Chicago Bears from 1975 to 1987. The Bears won Super Bowl XX in 1985. Payton was made a member of the Pro Football Hall of Fame in 1993. He died of cholangiocarcinoma (bile duct cancer) in 1999. == Other websites == *Payton34.com - Walter and Connie Payton Foundation *Walter Payton's Roundhouse.com *Walter Payton Cancer Fund.org - official site Category:1954 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Deaths from cholangiocarcinoma Category:American football running backs Category:Chicago Bears players Category:Sportspeople from Mississippi
title: Walter Payton
